name: Daniel Garcia
text: Awesome tasty pizza. No covid shut down. Employees all of them from insiders to ur delivery drivers wear masks. It's local started right here in Colorado.

name: Lauren Robbins
text: As a repeat customer, I wanted to provide feedback based on my two recent purchases. Last week, I purchased a large square pan pizza and upon delivery, noted dark brown/black human hairs (3-4" in length) in my pizza. I contacted the store â€¦More

name: Cade Sigafus
text:
Great, quick service. Delicious food. Everyone will like it
One of the better pizza places!

name: tony glock
text: is this where dylan and eric worked? not a fan of what they did but if they worked here this place is LEGENDARY, and a little bit scary.

name: Rhett Travis
text: I love Blackjack. Typically have their pan pizza. Lots of cheese comes on it. Quick, friendly service. Good deals.

name: Catalina Reyes
text: This location gets it right every single time! Love being repeat customers

name: Brendan Janssen
text:
Their pizza is a little greasy, but it's definitely tasty.
However, I've ordered delivery from here three times so far and they have always forgot the 2 liter. I would give it 4 stars if they didn't forget the drink every time.

name: shawn landsman
text: They delivered a raw pizza when I refused to accept it and send it back. They then said they could no longer deliver to my house. They didnâ€™t call and say anything I had to call and ask why. They made up a story and I had video it was not true. It would be zero if I could

name: Erik Beutler
text: They fixed the mistake. After making a pretty big mistake they made it right and credited us or purchase also.  Nobody is perfect. You almost made up for it. Thanks.

name: David Moore
text: Only place where I get pizza hot every time. Pizza hut and papa john's pizza, always cold everytime. They have great salads as well.

name: anon e. Muss
text: Why go with Domino's or worse when blackjack has better pizza? Try their salads too. Worth it! Now I'm addicted to blackjack at least once, maybe twice a month. Can't help it. Good thin crust, great hand tossed, fresh, plentiful toppings, couldn't ask for a better delivery pizza.

name: Dustin Morton
text: Ordered a pizza online.  Email said 30 min until delivery.  After waiting a hour I called the store to check on the order.  I was told the driver left 10 min ago it should be there soon.  I waited a one more hour and called again.  So after â€¦More

name: Heavy Hitta
text: Man, how hard is it to read an order! Forget salad, forget ranch or extra ranch! Anything extra, they forget! I had a guy forget our 2 liter? Ask me what kind, went to the gas station to buy one! But they'll still charge you for them! They â€¦More

name: Delaney Hyland
text: BOMB pizza. For real, the cheese bread was super good too. Almost better than the pizza. Highly recommend.

name: Daniel Downing
text: Love pizza at this location and love the people but I swear Everytime I order pizza they forget the dipping sauce I ordered

name: jadee
text: Very rude when I asked about the TEC-DC9 special.

name: Ron Gonzales
text: Ordered a pizza and salad last week. They forgot the salad dressing. Ordered cheese sticks with bacon this time. They forgot the bacon. I guess the only thing to do is to have the driver show the order at the door to verify it since they can't get it right.

name: Peter Starz
text: We love pizza

name: stefanie ferebee
text: There's just something about that sauce...!

name: Lynnzie Woodard
text: First off, Blackjack pizza has been around for years. It was my late grandmaâ€™s favorite pizza of all time and she was from Switzerland (they are very picky there), so she would only ever choose the very BEST when it came to great tasting â€¦More

name: Little Birdie
text: We love ordering pizza from here! We usually order online so we can customize it and itâ€™s just perfect every time. I highly recommend the ranch on the side.

name: Josh Kinkelaar
text: I dont live near a blackjack, but decided to order carryout for a football draft and bring along.  I was pretty impressed.  Guy who took my order was fast and courteous.  The lady at counter ehen I picked up was very friendly.  My order was â€¦More

name: Smalex Smanderson
text: This is the family go to. Quality, tasty pizza, great deals. The ranch is made in house and we always order a few extra containers for the house.

name: D Wood
text: Looking for melty cheese? How about crunchy crust? But you cant forget the customized toppings! BLACKJACK PIZZA has it all! Delivery and carryout options make getting to your pizza craving a cinch! With a friendly smile and great tasting pies its hard to beat these guys! Thanks for always making my family happy! -Des

name: Joe Fitz
text: Great pizza! Great salad! James is the best!

name: Burton Sweeting
text: We searched out Persian food prior to leaving for the Denver airport. We were greeted warmly by the staff. A typical order for us was Koubideh and rice. Another standby is Joojeh kabob (chicken). Both meats were very good. The rice I found â€¦More

name: Andrew McAllister
text: Of course we always love Blackjack. They have super fresh, and yummy ingredients. Tonight though, our experience could have made me hate them but has instead made me love them all the more. We ordered quite a bit of pizza plus a salad, â€¦More

name: Alex R.
text: The square deep dish was really good! Never had it before and didn't know what to expect. They also didn't skimp on the cheese.

name: John Norm
text: Best pizza around. Hot wings are good and the chicken Caesar salads are awesome!

name: AMB 1322
text: I have ordered blackjack from other locations before, and always had a decent experience. (Thatâ€™s what saved this particular establishment from receiving one star.) First off the driver looked at me like I had grown a third arm when I asked â€¦More

name: Robert Turner
text: Good enough pizza. Ordered online. It said the order would be ready in 20 min, took 50 min. Usually they are fast. Salad was not made to the request which was clear on the order pasted to top.

name: Trina Wright
text: I love this place.  Been ordering since 1991 and have never been disappointed.  There are so many places to choose from and this team strives for excellence.  The food and prices are fantastic.  Thank you Team!

name: Voytek Tomas
text: Their delicious pizza is a good deal

name: steele savajian
text: Amazing pizza! Wings are great too, except I got the extra hot ones and while I was wiping a man tear away I got sauce in my eye.

name: Evan Fisch
text: Really high quality. Square pan is delicious

name: Kimberly Johnson
text: Amazing

name: Mike Braaten
text: Great sauce and gooey cheese.  I prefer to pick it up to ensure fresh from the oven deliciousness.

name: Dervis Keranovic
text: I put in order ...then told cant deliver cause no change ...remind you he ask cash or cardðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚then try tell me safety skills of not caring change ...lord have mercy really ðŸ˜³ðŸ˜³

name: vang yang
text: Great variety on the menu. Large Hand-tossed good deal, southwest chicken salad with spicy ranch, and the calzone were fresh and tasted great!

name: Dan Kuhl
text: Great service and great pizza

name: Brian Froh
text: I work in the area and frequent this location. The staff here are really friendly and always treat me right. I've always received top quality service and food from this location. Thanks!!

name: SA Pryor
text: The pizza was excellent, service lacked a bit

name: Jay Cee
text: Love it

name: Nick Herrera
text: Itâ€™s gotten increasingly inconsistent on quality.  Granted itâ€™s always quick but they might not be very busy anymore.  Unfortunately I will not be a customer here anymore.

name: Leo Galvez
text: This pizza has gotten me sick twice.

name: Ross
text: First day open under new ownership and I can already see and taste the difference! I placed an order for pickup and it was ready in the time stated over the phone. Their staff was polite and friendly. Big change from my last experience â€¦More

name: Emily W
text: I never usually write a review but I felt compelled to after my recent order. This location is awesome! I have had only the best experiences with Blackjack and that's hard to find these days. Fast delivery, hot pizza and cold drinks and the â€¦More

name: melissa
text: The pizza is great and the staff is always friendly. I usually pick up my pizza but the few times i have had it delivered, it came very fast. One time we were even sure it couldn't possibly be them already when the doorbell rang.

name: John Figueroa
text: Still one of the best pan pizzas from any pizza chain. What you choose to put on it is up to you. The pan pizza is their best pizza with the great burnt cheese on the ends of the crust and a nice golden crisp on the bottom.

name: Vanessa riggenbach
text: Very good pizza.

name: Michael Steinmiller
text: Was told after an hour and a half that I might get my food...and also my attitude wasn't pleasant...2 hours...for pizza... sorry if I was so impolite

name: Averi Farrell
text: I ordered pizza and wings last night. The woman manager said she had the notes in front of her but I talked to a guy there that said that night they were training new people and everything was screwed up. I told her 2 Times that I ordered â€¦More

name: Helen Romero
text: Not as GOOD AS IT USED TO BE.....NEEDS TO BE COOKED BETTER!

name: Joe Westerdale
text: I am a long time customer.  I believe it has local ownership and they care very much about their food quality.  Love their specialty pizzas. Four stars ****

name: Natalie Asher
text: Hadn't had blackjacks since I lived at home. Quality hasn't changed a bit!

name: Jessica Fann
text: I ordered 15 pizzas from here for my daughter's birthday party. Pizzas came smashed. Store manager Jordan and owner Sean refused to replace in time (wanted to send them 2 hours later) or offer a refund. I had to dispute the charges with my credit card to get anything solved. Won't ever go back!

name: Melissa Martinez
text: Good value

name: Mil Ng
text: Very clean establishment, my order was taken quickly and it was only a 15 minute wait.

name: Jordan Ensinger
text: Very friendly service an really pizza

name: Lissa S.
text:
We ordered a pizza for work and they got it wrong. The lady who took the order was rude.
Had the delivery guy take back the pizza's and had to wait another 20 minutes and they still charged us. And there all ugly.

name: Paul Schroeder
text: My wife and I have ordered from this Blackjack 3 times in the last 5 years and they have messed up the order every time. Last night was an XL pepperoni pizza and two cheese breads. We got a extra cheese pizza instead. I used to work at the â€¦More

name: Luis Sandoval
text: Waited over half an hour for our food because they placed our order the wrong name, charge us extra for stuff we didn't order, and to add to that, we found hair in our pizza. Overall, worst pizza experience you could ask for.

name: Saijid Pena
text: Good pizza @ a good price...

name: James Rasmussen
text: Had the salad wasn't half bad.

name: Lauren DeCoste
text: Sorry guys not this time.  My bread sticks under cooked,  called the store off university and got put on hold and was left on hold for about a min in half to two min,  hung up cuz i figuerd it saturday night little busy i get it but i â€¦More

name: MooHong Kim
text: Great service weather it be delivery or carryout. Awesome pizza. Wonderful staff.

name: Amanda Young
text: Good pizza, dependable quality, good customer service and friendly employees. They've definitely earned my business in an area with so many other options for delivery!

name: Phylicia Decker
text: Service is incredible compared to many fast food pizza restaurants. The pizza is delicious have been eating here for years!!!

name: Tony Avery
text: Beat pizza & delivery in Centennial!  Best pizza and service.   When they say 30 minutes it's usually 25, etc.  It's our go to pizza joint.

name: kendra martinez
text: Called in for a deliver and the service was great! They found me the best deal on what I ordered and was super friendly!!!!

name: Rudy Rodriguez
text: Good store and great pizza!

name: Drew Parish
text:
rudest pizza place I have ever called.

1st there was some stupid voice mail saying I was outside the there area, WHO â€¦More

name: Daniel
text: Very delicious

name: Adalbert Kanka
text: Best crust in town

name: Pete Rojas
text: Good anchovies.....

name: Greg Dwyer
text: Our pizza place

name: Elizabeth Carroll
text: Ordered via Grubhub, two hours later, it never showed up. Canâ€™t give a rating to something youâ€™re not having.

name: Terri Dunn
text: Awful service

name: Gabe Stephens
text: I love BlackJack, great pizza and awesome people!

name: Rob V
text: According to the delivery map on the website this University location should deliver to a house 1/4 mile south of Wildcat Reserve,but when you call, they don't honor the map. .

name: Jessica Ashcraft
text: Bomb food

name: Brianna Kitley
text: Yummm

name: sebastian muller
text: Decent pizza

name: Rohan Dsouza
text: Great prices.

name: Socio Soce
text: They're very rude on the phone. I want my pizza tossed by Eric Harris, and they just hang up the phone. How rude
